name: Open Home (Game Jam)
description:
Description: Open Home was a Skyward production for the Global Game Jam 2018 made in 48 hours. The theme was 'Home is where the heart is'.

Goal: Take control of Betty a real-estate witch! Run, Fly, Bash and clean up the pesky sentient furniture and restore order to the home before the viewers arrive!

Please note: You will need a game-pad/controller in order to play Open Home.

Let us know in the comments if you managed to win! (It was a little difficult).

Controls: 
Left Joystick - Movement
Right Joystick - Directional aim
R2 - Bash
L2 - Broomstick (fly)
A - Interact/Pick-up/Drop
